carpet.rule.flintAndSteelBehavior.desc: Use flintAndSteel item to activate redstone machines.
carpet.rule.growableFungus.desc: Fungus will grow by random ticks.
carpet.rule.fungusGrowthChance.desc: Chance for fungus growth. Also see `growableFungus`.
carpet.rule.fungusGrowthMinLightLevel.de: Minimum light level for fungus growth (Include it). Also see `growableFungus`.
carpet.rule.harvestableTallPlant.desc: Use shears item to get the real tall plant items.
carpet.rule.movableEnderChest.desc: Pistons will move the ender chests. Requires `movableBlockEntities`.
carpet.rule.movableReinforcedDeepslate.d: Pistons will move the reinforced deepslates.
carpet.rule.movableRespawnAnchor.desc: Pistons will move the respawn anchors. Requires `movableBlockEntities`.
carpet.rule.movableEndPortalFrame.desc: Pistons will move the end portal frame blocks. Requires `movableBlockEntities`.
carpet.rule.movableSpawners.desc: Pistons will move the spawner blocks. Requires `movableBlockEntities`.
carpet.rule.enderPearlChunkLoader.desc: Ender pearls will load chunks when it is flying.
carpet.rule.noteBlockChunkLoader.desc: Note blocks will load chunks when play it.
carpet.rule.modifyMinecartDrop.desc: Minecart will drop itself (Exclude items inside).
carpet.rule.creativeOneHitKill.desc: One hit to kill entities! (Only Creative mode)
carpet.rule.xpOrbColumnInteraction.desc: Bubble columns will push or pull XP orb entities like with other entities and items.
carpet.rule.passiveEnderman.desc: Endermen will not be angry when you see them.
carpet.rule.endermanOnlySpawnInTheEnd.de: Endermen will only spawn in the end.
carpet.rule.spawnEggsWithNoAI.desc: Spawn mobs with spawn egg items will not have AI.
carpet.rule.stonecuttorDoDamage.desc: Entities will be hurt/heal when stepping on the redstone-powered stonecuttor blocks.
Mobs will not spawn in overworld.
carpet.rule.disableMobSpawningNether.des: Mobs will not spawn in nether.
carpet.rule.disableMobSpawningTheEnd.des: Mobs will not spawn in the end.
carpet.rule.playerDeathDropAllXP.desc: All XP will be dropped when player's death.
carpet.rule.toggleableEyeOnEndPortalFram: End portal frame blocks will drop the eye on them when they have eye.
carpet.rule.replaceableFlowers.desc: Right-click flower block with other flower to replace it.
carpet.rule.replaceableFlowersInPot.desc: Right-click pot block with other flower to replace the flower inside.
carpet.rule.pickFlowersFromPot.desc: Right-click pot block to take the flower inside.
carpet.rule.disablePhantomSpawningForCre: Phantoms will not spawn for creative players.
carpet.rule.disablePhantomSpawningInMush: Phantoms will not spawn in mushroom island.
Allows tridents thrown by drowned to use the enchantments on the trident held by said drowned.
Loyalty tridents will return to their owner when thrown into the void.
carpet.rule.impalingAffectsMobsInWaterOr: Apply the Impaling enchantment on any mob that is in water or rain.
carpet.rule.disablePhantomSpawningWhenMo: Phantoms will not spawn when mobcap is full.
